Question: Swistor CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Switzerland Global Enterprise

Swistor CES 2024

- Electrode supercapacitors for sustainable energy storage charging 4x faster
- AI-powered SaaS people development platform for companies to avoid churn
- Stylish perovskite solar cells integrate solar cells into any sized IoT device
- Autonomous charging for heavy-duty commercial vehicles for sustainable electric vehicles
Summary_cn:
瑞士全球企业

Swistor CES 2024

- 可持续能源储存的电极超级电容器，充电速度提高4倍
- 基于人工智能的SaaS人才发展平台，帮助公司避免员工流失
- 时尚的钙钛矿太阳能电池，可将太阳能电池集成到任何规模的物联网设备中
- 用于可持续电动车的重型商用车辆的自主充电技术
